resources.string: Hello my name is Michal Wolas. I am a Computer Science student in UCC, I have just done my 2nd year. I am currently doing an android development course in my spare time. \n \n My favourite areas of computer science are programming, Web and Mobile development, designing and working with databases.
My hobbies outside of Computer Science include Fencing , I am the current Treasurer for the club in UCC. \n I also enjoy video games and cycling in my spare time

During my Time in University and also in my own time I have made a few apps and websites. For web development I am familiar with both with python and php for database communication, and of course HTML5 and CSS. I have also used Javascript and its frameworks like JQuery.
Most of my projects can be found on my github ( micho213 ).
My github: \n\nSome screenshots of my work below:

My Skills from university: 
 
 Languages: Python, Java, HTML + CSS + + Jquery and normal JS , php, Assembly (MIPS)
 Knowledge in areas of Operating systems, Computer Architecture, Networking and Web servers. How to write efficient algorithms along with necessary data structures. 
 
 Self-Learning: 
 
 I am currently learning android mobile development, I also enjoy making websites and have made a few as my own projects
